title: HR and Admin
jd: We are looking for a dynamic HR & Admin Manager with 1-2 years of experience from a reputed institution, who can drive people initiatives, ensure statutory HR compliance, and manage administration in a fast-paced startup. This role requires a quick-thinking professional who can implement processes at jet speed, balance employee welfare with business needs, manage compliance with local bodies and statutory authorities, and constantly build a positive company culture.

title: Finance Controller
jd: We are looking for a dynamic, CA-qualified Finance Controller who will take complete ownership of the finance function in our growing startup...
